Articles.Content:
My name's Xaelath. I'm from Malaysia. I've been playing KSP for more than two months already and here's what I achieved without using MJ, HyperEdit or cheats.

1. Landed on Minmus!

2. Landed several other landers on Minmus a few days later.

3. Landed on the Mun.

Other than that, I casually play with MJ and HE

I hope we can be good friends.

S'up

Welcome to the forums!

hmm so your from Malaysia, well, I'm from Jakarta (I only speak english though sadly) but still welcome

Hai right back at you

Saya gembira jumpa awak.
Welcome aboard! We always like to have an international flair (or at lease, we SHOULD)

Nice to meet you guys.

Selamat pagi!*

Glad to hear you've been enjoying the game. Keep us posted on your future accomplishments, and don't be afraid to ask for help if you need it. We're a generally friendly bunch, as you've already seen

* That is literally the only Malay phrase I know.

Yep, you guys really are! I've been lurking for a month before deciding to create an account.

*Selamat pagi means good morning.
Welcome aboard! Don't be afraid t share your stories and screenshots! We'd love to see em!
Welcome. I hope my (online) translation is right: tiga, dua, satu, mengangkat!

Welcome aboard! Don't be afraid t share your stories and screenshots! We'd love to see em!

I will! I just don't know how.

Welcome. I hope my (online) translation is right: tiga, dua, satu, mengangkat!

Yes, it's kinda right! Although mengangkat means lifting.. XD

Hi and welcome!

Do you speak both languages fluently? Is there any story behind that, or is that just regular school learning? Do you know any other languages by chance?

I will! I just don't know how.

Pressing F1 in game will save a screenshot to your game's Screenshot folder. You can then upload that to a file sharing service. Imgur is very popular on these forums, since it's free and there is a BBCode tag for embedding Imgur albums directly in posts:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/36010-Introducing-the-Ability-to-Embed-Imgur-Albums!

Hi and welcome!

Do you speak both languages fluently? Is there any story behind that, or is that just regular school learning? Do you know any other languages by chance?

Pressing F1 in game will save a screenshot to your game's Screenshot folder. You can then upload that to a file sharing service. Imgur is very popular on these forums, since it's free and there is a BBCode tag for embedding Imgur albums directly in posts:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/36010-Introducing-the-Ability-to-Embed-Imgur-Albums!

Of course! English is my favourite language since I was a kid! It started as regular school learning, and then over time I grew a liking to the English language. I also know Bahasa Iban (which is my native language) and I'm learning Japanese at the moment.

Also, thanks for teaching me how to upload images!

And what if I want to upload an individual image separately? Not the whole album?

Of course! English is my favourite language since I was a kid! It started as regular school learning, and then over time I grew a liking to the English language. I also know Bahasa Iban (which is my native language) and I'm learning Japanese at the moment.

Also, thanks for teaching me how to upload images!

And what if I want to upload an individual image separately? Not the whole album?

Very cool. I have a friend who knows English, Japanese, and Korean all fluently and she makes money on the side translating text. I, myself only speak English and a tiny sliver of Spanish.

For a single image, you can use the "Insert Image" icon in the reply window. It will automatically generate the BBCode to link an image. You just need to paste in the URL you get from Imgur that should look like this:

http://i.imgur.com/ETXW6ZU.png

Imgur also gives you the exact BBCode to copy paste into a post, so you can use that as well (it's just the URL surrounded by IMG tags).

Hope that helps!

Very cool. I have a friend who knows English, Japanese, and Korean all fluently and she makes money on the side translating text. I, myself only speak English and a tiny sliver of Spanish.

For a single image, you can use the "Insert Image" icon in the reply window. It will automatically generate the BBCode to link an image. You just need to paste in the URL you get from Imgur that should look like this:

http://i.imgur.com/ETXW6ZU.png

Imgur also gives you the exact BBCode to copy paste into a post, so you can use that as well (it's just the URL surrounded by IMG tags).

Hope that helps!

That's very helpful of you! Thank you! And inserting an image only works if I use Imgur's

BBCode instead of the forum's Insert Image icon.

By the way, that's a long spaceplane. o.o

Huh, URL-only should have worked, but so long as you can copy/paste, I guess you're good though.

Ha! I didn't even pay attention to which image I was linking. That was a fun one.

Made for this challenge:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/69931-The-VERY-Longfellow

It was very funny to try to fly.
